trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Chickasha
There were no other sightings in Chickasha on or around August 1st 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsTraveling South from Oklahoma City to Lawton on I-44. I noticed something In the sky. The Object appeared to be moving from east to west. What caught my eye was the shimmer of direction change. The shimmer was very subtle. It appeared to be white in color, didnt really appear to be very reflective. The Object appeared to be rectangular or cigar shapped. The Object appeared to turn South-southwest, and leave at an high rate of speed. Object was gone within 1-2 seconds after it made the turn. Wife was in the vehicle asleep. Woke her up to make note of sighting. Decided to report after watching a program on the history channel. One of the opening pictures looked very similar to the Object I had seen.
